title: How do I use the ability timer command?
body: Ever since they added the ability timer where it shows the abilities time in the chat I still haven't been able to do that. I keep trying the Control+(Q-R) or G+(Q-R) and thats all i know as of now. Does anyone know where the command change is in the settings? I can't seem to find it. Much appreciated since i main Shen and would be godly to not type my CD everytime..

replies.body:
The magic key in this case is the Alt key!  Hold on to Alt, then left click any ability to show the cooldown command.  Hope that helps!

-- I feel like "Hold on to alt" would be a great song name!

It still doesn't work for me. Is their something in the settings/commands that you can change?

There could be a potential issue with your config files that's causing this?  Have you made any modifications to it?  We can try resetting it to see if that works:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if that works!
Thanks a lot! It works! Sadly i need to change all my controls back to my usually set up but its worth. Thanks very much. Have a good day :)
